name: Floppy Fish (HADEX)
description:
Source code:https://github.com/HadyMash/Floppy-Fish

Controls - Flappy Mode

Space, W, Up Arrow, or Left Mouse button to jump

Controls - Swim Mode

W/Up arrow to accelerate upwards, S/Down Arrow to accelerate downwards.

---

Trash pixel art: by Clint Bellanger (https://opengameart.org/content/recycle-items-set)

My second entry (I couldn't finish it in time): https://xd-hadex.itch.io/plasteroids
